__comments: 0. These comments will not be interpreted. For detailed info read Dev/mediawiki.
1. The order of the files matters, because of dependencies
2. You can use comments which all need to start with //
3. The MultiWiki and LocalWiki headlines are just non-functional indicators for your information
4. The justcopy category is for mixed files css and js the will just be copied, not be part of a combined file
